## core package

A HTTP data harvesting framework for jobs that require authentication

## Remarks

Provides the core abstractions and functionality.

|  Class | Description |

|  [ResourcePayload](./core.resourcepayload.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> |

|  [Response\_2](./core.response_2.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> see [IResponse](./core.iresponse.md) |
